about: Create a report to help fix bugs and crashes
title: ''

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Acutal behavior**
What actually happened instead of what was ment to happen

**Logs**
The latest log file in the /logs folder when the crash happened or what error was displayed in the app

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: [Windows or Linux]
 - Version [e.g. 0.7.0-beta]

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
